Start by creating an account on [GitHub](https://github.com/). GitHub is how you'll be able to collaborate with others in a way that tracks changes over time while facilitating a range of project management tools. 

Dr. Jennifer Bryan has some nice guidelines for [picking a good username](https://happygitwithr.com/github-acct#username-advice) so choose carefully when you make your profile. We also recommend adding a picture of yourself so that group members can more confidently identify one another on GitHub.
